name: Degenatron
description:
MOVE - A & D Keys

JUMP - Spacebar

JUMP MORE - Spam Spacebar

Made for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3, following the theme of "Less is More".  Built in 8 hours using Unity, Degenatron is a platformer where every successive jump decreases the heights you can reach. But chain them together and you'll fly.  Handbuilt except for the sound effects, which I got from https://mixkit.co (open license).

Let me know if you like it and what needs improvement! This is my first Game Jam :D
